/api.onProxyReq: function(proxyReq, req, res) { console.log('Proxying request:', req.method, req.url); }
/api.onProxyRes: function(proxyRes, req, res) { console.log('Received response:', proxyRes.statusCode, req.url); }

/users.onProxyReq: function(proxyReq, req, res) { console.log('Proxying request:', req.method, req.url); }
/users.onProxyRes: function(proxyRes, req, res) { console.log('Received response:', proxyRes.statusCode, req.url); }
